item.title: Nielson Diplomata 350 4×2 6×2 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 14, 2025

Nielson Diplomata 350 4×2 6×2 v1.0 ETS2

You’re looking for a very specific and iconic bus mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2)!
The “Nielson Diplomata 350 4×2 6×2 sc ETS2” refers to a mod that brings the classic Brazilian bus model into the game, with options for different chassis configurations, and “sc” likely indicates it’s a Scania-powered version (as Scania was a common chassis for these buses).

Here’s a breakdown:
Nielson Diplomata 350: This is a legendary bus model from the Brazilian coachbuilder Carrocerias Nielson (later Busscar). The Diplomata 350 was known for its distinctive design, comfort, and reliability, becoming a staple on Brazilian intercity routes. It evokes a strong sense of nostalgia for many in Brazil.

4×2 and 6×2: These refer to the chassis configurations:
4×2: A bus with two axles, where only the rear axle is driven. This is the standard configuration for many buses.
6×2: A bus with three axles, where one of the rear axles is a liftable or fixed support axle (often referred to as a “trucado” or “trucado” in Brazil). This configuration allows for greater passenger and luggage capacity and better weight distribution.

“sc” (Scania): This typically indicates that the bus mod is modeled on a Nielson Diplomata 350 built on a Scania chassis. Scania (like Mercedes-Benz and Volvo) supplied many chassis for bus bodybuilders in Brazil, and the engine and transmission characteristics would be based on Scania components.

ETS2 (Euro Truck Simulator 2): The game for which this mod is designed. Unlike truck mods, bus mods often allow players to drive routes with passengers, making them popular with a different segment of the ETS2 community.

What to expect from a Nielson Diplomata 350 ETS2 Mod:
Classic Brazilian Bus Experience: The mod aims to recreate the unique look, feel, and sound of this iconic Brazilian bus.
Detailed Modeling: High-quality exterior and interior modeling, including the classic Nielson design elements.
Multiple Chassis Options: The ability to choose between 4×2 and 6×2 (or even 6×4 if available) chassis.

Credits: FABIANO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Kalybay – a lost Road to Aral’s city v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 13, 2025

Kalybay – a lost Road to Aral’s city v1.0 ETS2

Road to Aral’s long history caused this city to be lost / re-done in many versions, sadly since nobody wants to work it, it is still missing (or the original city is) from both Road to Aral Versions
This mod re-adds it for FunTrucker_18’s 1.54 Road to Aral Revamped 1.0
Compatibility: 1.54

Credits: brian the trucker

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
